title: How to Make Peanut Butter and Jelly Sushi Rolls

steps.headline: Wash your hand and clean your work surface.
steps.description: A counter top or chopping board make ideal preparation options.

steps.headline: Cut the crusts from the bread slices.
steps.description: Trim them off with a knife.

steps.headline: Use a rolling pin to flatten the slice of bread completely.
steps.description: You can also use a heavy can to flatten the bread of you don't have a rolling pin.

steps.headline: Take a bread slice and spread one tablespoon of strawberry jam/jelly I've it.
steps.description: Add a tablespoon of peanut butter evenly. Repeat with the second bread slice.

steps.headline: Roll up each slice of bread tightly.
steps.description: Make it resembles a good-sized spiral.

steps.headline: Use a knife to cut each "roll" into four equal pieces.
steps.description: Use a very sharp knife to avoid pinching the roll.

steps.headline: Arrange on a plate and enjoy.

text: Wash your hand and clean your work surface. A counter top or chopping board make ideal preparation options. Cut the crusts from the bread slices. Trim them off with a knife. Use a rolling pin to flatten the slice of bread completely. You can also use a heavy can to flatten the bread of you don't have a rolling pin. Take a bread slice and spread one tablespoon of strawberry jam/jelly I've it. Add a tablespoon of peanut butter evenly. Repeat with the second bread slice. Roll up each slice of bread tightly. Make it resembles a good-sized spiral. Use a knife to cut each "roll" into four equal pieces. Use a very sharp knife to avoid pinching the roll. Arrange on a plate and enjoy.
